articles.author: Steve Almasy
articles.title: Vegas Golden Knights win first Stanley Cup in young franchise’s history after defeating Florida Panthers - CNN
articles.description: The Vegas Golden Knights, in just their sixth NHL season, defeated the Florida Panthers 9-3 Tuesday night in Las Vegas to win the franchise’s first Stanley Cup in five games.
articles.content:
The Vegas Golden Knights, in just their sixth NHL season, defeated the Florida Panthers 9-3 Tuesday night in Las Vegas to win the franchises first Stanley Cup in five games.

articles.title: Activision Blizzard: US judge blocks takeover by Microsoft until further hearings - The Guardian
articles.description: Federal Trade Commission secures delay of $69bn deal which it argues would be anti-competitive
articles.content:
A US district judge has granted the Federal Trade Commissions request to temporarily block Microsofts $69bn buyout of video game maker Activision Blizzard and set a hearing next week.

articles.title: PGA Tour commissioner Jay Monahan recovering from medical issue - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: PGA Tour commissioner Jay Monahan is recovering from an undisclosed medical situation, according to a statement issued Tuesday night.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES -- PGA Tour commissioner Jay Monahan is recovering from an undisclosed medical situation, according to a joint statement from Monahan and the PGA Tour Policy Board on Tuesday night.
